Name: AR-15 Short Handguard
Description: The AR-15 Short Handguard is designed to be used with short barrels on AR-15 rifles. In civilian circles, some AR-15 variants with extremely short barrels and handguards have gained popularity as compact self-defense weapons. These AR-15 variants, equipped with short handguards and barrels, offer excellent concealment and maneuverability, similar to submachine guns, making them effective in confined spaces. Additionally, they utilize rifle cartridges, providing adequate stopping power.
